title: Interpretation of seeing grapes in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: In general, grapes in a dream indicate wealth and a lot of money. It also indicates the dreamer's ability to make those around him happy. Some interpreters believe that seeing and eating grapes means prosperity and reward after making many efforts, and indicates the following: Commentators said that it carries with it goodness and anxiety depending on whether grapes appear in season or not. If the dreamer catches a bunch of grapes in his dream, then this It means that he will get money through a woman. Black grapes indicate temporary nourishment that will disappear quickly. In addition to seeing them out of season, this indicates that the dreamer will suffer from great sadness. Black grapes are less beneficial than white grapes in a dream. The vision also indicates the goodness that the dreamer sees in his marriage. If the dreamer sees grapes growing on his head, this means that his head will Destroy.Also do not miss:Interpretation of seeing fruit in a dreamInterpretation of seeing grapes in a dreamIbn Sirin The great scholar Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a vine in a dream is one of the good visions for a person, such as: Ibn Sirin tended to say that seeing grapes means kindness, livelihood, and abundant money that the dreamer will obtain And the satisfaction of desires. It also indicates a charming and pleasing lady. As Ibn Sirin says, this vision indicates the approach of marriage if the dreamer is single... changing circumstances and strengthening social relationships. In addition, it indicates successful marital relationships, the feeling of comfort and security present in the dreamer’s emotional relationships. Ibn Sirin believes The interpretation of seeing grapes in season is much better than seeing them out of season. In some cases, it can indicate a person who enjoys generosity and generosity, giving to people without expecting them in return, in addition to his extreme honesty in his work. If the dreamer is sick and sees grapes in his sleep. This is good news that he will get rid of his illness. If a person is poor or going through a difficult ordeal, his vision indicates that things will change for the better. Grape juice indicates an easy situation and many profits that the dreamer will achieve in the coming period and his righteous grandchildren. It also states the things designated for the dreamer. If the dreamer squeezes grapes until he turns them into wine, this indicates that the person is doing actions that do not please God, and he must hasten to repent before it is too late. If the dreamer is sick and squeezes grapes in his dream, this indicates that God will heal him from his illness. And if he is imprisoned, God will release him as a prisoner. In some cases, a dream about eating grapes indicates that the dreamer drank a lot of alcohol. If the dreamer is a student and pinches grapes in his dream, this is news for him that he will gain money to spend on knowledge to benefit from it. When the fortuneteller takes grape seeds Without grapes himself, this indicates a dispute between him and his wife. Interpretation of seeing grapes in a dream according to Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi believes that this vision indicates sustenance, benefit, and abundance of money. Its interpretation is as follows: Grapes in a dream indicate that the dreamer’s wife gives birth to a child who will serve as a bond with him. If the dreamer picks a bunch of grapes in his dream, it means that he will receive a huge sum of money.

title: Interpretation of a dream about hearing someone’s voice without seeing him

preview.html: The dream suggests logical explanations for the dreamer in all social situations. To learn more about the interpretation of this dream, follow the following lines from our website gptafser.com/, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing someone’s voice without seeing it in a dream about a single girl: Seeing the unmarried girl was hearing someone’s voice without seeing him and she was angry and strong. It appears that there are many One of the problems that a single girl will face while she is currently busy with her life. It is an indication of the great tragedies and anger that she will experience, which she is currently emptying within herself. And the unmarried woman who heard the voice of someone she loves, was calm, sweet in her dreams and very beautiful. It indicates a peaceful and acceptable life, And getting rid of sorrows, God willing. It also indicates the strange things that she is trying to search for at this time in her life. Seeing the dream means that she is entering into some serious matters in her life and occupying her mind. It also explains the end of the problems that she was seeing or going through at that time. Hearing the voice of someone crying in a dream is a sign that she will be exposed to great harm in her life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about hearing the voice of the dead on the phone. Interpretation of seeing someone’s voice without seeing it in a dream about a married woman. Seeing a married woman hearing the voice of someone who is angry with her and screaming. An indication of many problems. And the issues that she is currently experiencing with her husband, and God knows best. She will enter into very long discussions that never end and will never end with those close to her. The dream indicates the bad things that this married woman will experience in her life. And if a strange voice is heard in the dream and he cries a lot in the dream. This A sign that she will be hurt in her life, and she will be very sorry. Her family and children will suffer from this evil in her life and she must be very careful. And if the voice she hears in a dream is very calm and gentle, then she is happy to hear it in a dream. It indicates a happy life that she accepts and gets rid of Of the problems that she is experiencing. It also indicates the abundance of goodness and sustenance for her and her family, God willing, without fatigue or misery for them. Interpretation of seeing someone’s voice without seeing it in a dream for a divorced woman. Seeing a divorced woman hears a strange voice in a dream and rejoices with her. An indication that she is going through a wonderful love story at this time. From her life and that she is very happy with her. It explains that he has gotten rid of the problems and major problems that he is going through now, and God knows best. The dream also shows that there is someone close to her who will propose to her or marry her. The dream also interprets the end of the bad things that she experiences with those who separated from her during this period. If A divorced woman heard the voice of someone she loved, became angry with him in the dream, and screamed. It shows that the love story she is living in this period will end. A divorced woman seeing a dream is nothing but evil that she will experience in this life. It also explains the big problem that she will face, and it will make her very upset and she will not overcome it. Read Also: Hearing my name in a dream. Interpretation of seeing hearing someone’s voice without seeing it in a dream about a man and its meaning. Seeing that the dreamer heard a human’s voice in a dream, and cried loudly in a dream. An indication of the great harm that he and his family will be exposed to in this period of his life.

title: Interpretation of seeing vegetables in a dream for unmarried women

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing vegetables in a dream for single and married women. Vegetables are foods that are beneficial to humans and we cannot refuse them because they provide us with energy and strength because they contain important nutritional elements and because they are used on a daily basis, as they can be seen in a dream, but the vision and interpretation differ, but in general it appears in the dream that it is a blessing and food. Delicious, but whoever sees that he is dealing with many types suggests many problems and worries and they will end soon, God willing and below. Let us explain to you in detail the interpretation of seeing vegetables in a dream for unmarried women. Interpretation of seeing vegetables in a dream. This is an explanation of the interpretation of seeing vegetables in a dream, as narrated by Muhammad Ibn Sirin: Seeing fresh, ripe vegetables in a dream indicates kindness, grace, and lawful goodness for the pioneer. While rotten vegetables symbolize difficulties. Which the dreamer is going through, and the pain and pain that he suffers from. Eating vegetables in a dream indicates what will happen to the pioneer in terms of ample livelihood and success in the coming period of his life, which may concern his work or his marriage, and may concern both. Sweet-tasting vegetables indicate contentment, happiness, and the fulfillment of desires. By order of God. However, if vegetables have a bitter taste in the dream, it is a bad omen that has an unpleasant effect, God forbid. Contrary to the prevailing belief that selling vegetables in a dream is a good thing, Ibn Sirin believes that selling them is an unpleasant vision that portends loss, and the more vegetables there are, the more difficult the matter becomes. If the dreamer is sick and dreams of selling vegetables, this is a harbinger of his recovery by God’s command. Interpretation of seeing vegetables in a dream for a single woman. In the following points we present the interpretation of seeing vegetables in a dream for a single woman: A lot of fresh vegetables in a dream symbolizes a well-off man making good advances towards her, and God will complete his blessings. He marries her in order to find happiness with him and give birth to good offspring from her. Eating fresh vegetables in her dream, and their taste is sweet, indicates a change in her condition from distress to weakness, and the death of anxiety and tension. Selling vegetables to unmarried people indicates that they are facing problems related to their studies or work, as for buying fresh vegetables It is good to get rid of worries and problems and that God Almighty directs them to the right path. Interpretation of a dream about vegetables in a dream for a married woman: A married woman can see vegetables in a dream in different situations, some of which indicate goodness and others do not, which we will explain in detail below: Buying fresh vegetables In a dream, it symbolizes the goodness and grace she enjoys with her family and her constant desire to manage her home according to the teachings of God Almighty. A married woman feeding her husband with vegetables symbolizes how much he loves her, and feeding her vegetables symbolizes the strength of the bond between them and portends an imminent pregnancy. Seeing eggplant indicates To stress and anxiety, while onions mean marital strife, just like rotten vegetables, while fresh vegetables are interpreted as praiseworthy and indicate abundant money that God has blessed. Then see leafy vegetables in a dream. Below is the interpretation of seeing vegetables in a dream, the leafy type: leafy vegetables

title: Interpretation of large buildings in a dream The meaning of buildings in a dream

preview.html: Large buildings, buildings for singles, for married people, for pregnant women, for divorced women, as for the building, the new building, the mall, the collapse and fall of buildings by Ibn Sirin and others. Interpretation of buildings in a dream: If you see large and beautiful buildings with green lawns extending in front of them, this indicates a long life characterized by wealth, travel and visits. For distant lands. Newly built small houses indicate happy homes and profitable businesses, but if the buildings are old and dirty, then poor health and deterioration of love and work will follow the dream. Dreaming of high-rise buildings can be evidence of the dreamer’s malice and cunning and the deception of another person, Seeing towers in a dream is one of the visions that indicate death and the final end of rule. Interpretation of tall towers in a dream Seeing a tower in a dream means victory over enemies in all situations that a person experiences, and moreover it means death, especially if the tower is abandoned and is located in a remote place. And far away, apart from the collapse of tall buildings in a dream indicates the dreamer’s bad behavior. Seeing famous towers in a dream indicates the war that is taking place in the place where the tower is located and he suffers from poverty and tension in managing the life in which it is located. Interpretation of the collapse of buildings in a dream if he sees If a person sees tall towers collapsing from his place, this is evidence of a warning from God about material loss for the one who sees the vision. Also, seeing famous towers in a dream indicates that the person is suffering from seizures and calamities. The situation in which these towers fall is a financial or economic and political crisis. Interpretation of high-rise buildings in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried woman sees two high-rise towers in a dream, this may be one of the good and praiseworthy visions that an unmarried girl sees. This is in addition to the fact that if an unmarried girl sees She goes up the high building in the elevator and is called with a handsome and attractive young man, it means that she will have good luck in her life and she will be so. A promising vision that she will get what she desires in life, and this is a praiseworthy vision for the estate and makes her feel comfortable and reassured in life. Interpretation of high-rise buildings in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing high places in this pregnant woman’s dream is evidence that she will give birth soon, and when she finds herself climbing the tower, this is a sign that she Pregnant in the first months, and seeing her fall from a high tower is a sign that she will emerge from labor safely without harming her or the mother being exposed to her and her child. Interpretation of tall buildings in a married woman’s dreamWhen a married woman sees tall buildings in a dream, this can indicate positive changes that are occurring in her life and expression About her good and promising future in marriage. But when a woman sees the leaning tower in a dream, it may mean that she has had bad luck in life and is suffering from many problems. Ibn Sirin’s vision of architecture - YouTube

title: Interpretation of a curse in a dream: Seeing a curse in a dream

preview.html: I dream of cursing and cursing and seeing my wife cursing someone or hearing cursing or cursing the father or mother and other dreams that we will explain to you today. Interpretation of swearing in a dream Seeing insults in a dream does not bode well, because it indicates sadness, bad luck and distress. Because of the problems and sorrows that the visionary will face, he will spend the night He is all sad and eager to think. Nightmares will return to his dreams again, so he will lose comfort and the taste of pleasure in his life. He will also experience extreme fatigue in love and attachment relationships because they will affect him in a negative interpretation. A vision that does not bode well and indicates that the visionary will face bad events and situations and will have to solve them and overcome them, but he He will not be able to use the potential available to him. He must be very careful in his steps, but he will do exactly the opposite, and as a result he will lose many good opportunities and jobs. Interpretation of a person’s curse in a dream: It says that he is going through disagreements and conflicts with someone close to him. His relationship with his closest friends will deteriorate due to lack of understanding and will reach To the point where they do not want to hear his voice. Interpretation of God’s curse in a dream: Seeing him does not bode well, but rather indicates the mistakes and sins he has committed throughout his life. Cursing God in a dream means that the dreamer is present in corruption and evil, and despite his knowledge of the path of truth and Islam, he will continue on the path of corruption and committing Sins. The vision also portends the dreamer going through problems and bad events and the emergence of major conflicts within the family. Disbelief in God in the dreamer’s dream means his exhaustion and excessive exhaustion due to the increase in problems and sorrows on his head, and in the end he will suffer great losses from his work and projects because of evil people who do not want him to advance and be kind. Interpretation of a mother’s curse in a dream: It indicates a corrupt person who does not have good qualities. He will fall into many problems and after that he will not be able to face society and people and will continue his path in darkness and corruption. Interpretation of a father’s curse in a dream: The emergence of major problems in the area of ​​insight in practical life, so he must seek help. With those around him, cursing the father in the dreamer’s dream means that his business will collapse very badly because he does not get full help from these people and therefore he will feel insulted and humiliated and will be careful in material matters after that. Interpretation of cursing the wife in a dream indicates the death of the visionary’s relationship with hatred of bad situations such as betrayal and ingratitude. It will be He is mean and disrespectful to everyone around him, while also turning against the people who take credit for his life and livelihood. Seeing a wife insulted in a dream means that many problems will arise with the people closest to the dreamer. He will try in every way to correct the situation, but he will never be able to. And this time will be very long and will negatively affect him, especially in his psychological state. Interpretation of the wife’s curse in a dream: Whoever dreams that he has cursed his wife indicates perjury and suspicion in marriage. Perhaps the curse indicates expulsion and separation between them, and this is from the origin of the curse, and it is called that because it is not Except by mentioning the curse. Interpretation of poison

title: Interpretation of a dream about being beaten to death in a dream

preview.html: Seeing beating in a dream of an unmarried girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, or a man, whether he is hitting with his hand, or with a knife, or with a sword, or with a gun, or with a stick, hitting the woman or mother on the head, stomach, back, face, and cheek, according to Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq. And others. Being beaten in a dream is one of the very frightening and frightening dreams that we see in our dreams and it comes in different forms, such as violently attacking someone, whether close to us or someone we do not know, or by beating and assaulting. By someone, whether we know him or not, and being beaten in a dream carries many important meanings that one must realize if you see him in a dream, because it portends good and evil. Interpretation of being beaten to death in a dream: Whoever of you sees him being beaten to death is a victory over someone. Interpretation of beatings in a dream Seeing beatings in a dream is evidence that goodness is imminent for the dreamer. If someone sees If a strong man hits him with a sharp object in a dream, this means that he will gain clothes or clothing. Being beaten by someone higher than him in authority, whether it is the king, his boss, or his manager, is evidence of an imminent marriage. Seeing someone attacking others in a dream with a stick or a hammer in a way Harsh is evidence that he wants to change his job in the near future. Seeing a person being hit in the eye is evidence of his desire to lose his religion and moving away. Seeing a person hitting another man and plucking the edges of his eyelids is evidence that he will call for innovations. Whoever hits another person in the head in a dream and is afflicted with it. Evidence of his good coming to Him. Hitting someone on the head in a dream is evidence that he will achieve a lot. Whoever sees that someone else has hit him in a part of his body is evidence of the suffering of one of his relatives. Seeing a beating in a dream is evidence of kindness and supplication for the dreamer. If one sees in a dream That he hits someone he does not know, this is evidence of destruction and malice. Seeing someone, holding another person’s hand and violently hitting him, is evidence that unpleasant, bad and very bad conversations are taking place around him. Seeing another person hitting him on the ear in a dream is evidence that he She will marry the son of Al-Masfu’. Hitting another person on the head in a dream with a crooked object is evidence that this person will harm him. If one sees a man hitting him in the eye in a dream, this is evidence that the injured person is suffering from neglect and distraction. Seeing a man hitting another without knowing Whoever hits him in the solution is evidence that he will get goodness and money. Hitting him with a wooden object is evidence that the perpetrator will fulfill his promises to hit. The person he hit is dead is evidence that he will escape from many problems. The pregnant woman he hit in the stomach is not... Knowing him in a dream is evidence that her dream is complete with kindness and a successful birth. title: The meaning of a rabbit in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a rabbit by Ibn SirinInterpretation of dreamsA rabbit in a dream is evidence of psychological problems that it is exposed to if it is brown in color. A dark-colored rabbit in a dream can be an indication of some social problems and for those who will end soon. Inside the white rabbit The dream is evidence that the viewer is exposed to some problems at work and the harassment that he receives Scenes of a female manager at work. A black rabbit in a dream is evidence of the fulfillment of the dreamer’s goals and desires. A dream of a rabbit by Ibn Shaheen. A rabbit in a dream indicates fatigue and effort to which the dreamer is exposed. Seeing a rabbit chasing him means that there will be rivalry between the dreamer and his friends. If one sees In his dream that he is carrying a rabbit, this means a bribe offered to him and he accepts it, and this indicates that money is forbidden. Ibn Shaheen confirmed that the black rabbit indicates undesirable events and that it brings many bad events to its owner. What is the interpretation of a dream about a rabbit according to Al-Nabulsi? The white rabbit is small in size, A sign of running into some problems and troubles. Dreaming about a white rabbit indicates fear and anxiety about some things in the dreamer’s life. Many white rabbits indicate difficulties that the dreamer will face. If the dreamer is planning to travel and sees a white rabbit in a dream, this is a sign of anxiety and difficulties that He will face her soon.Seeing a rabbit dreaming of a single womanSeeing a rabbit in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates good appearance and good behavior with others.A white rabbit in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates her relationship with a person of good character and piety.Nutrition signRabbitIn a dream, an unmarried woman is evidence of marriage From a person who respects morals. A girl’s dream of a black rabbit indicates that there are some people in her life from whom she will find betrayal. Seeing a group of brown rabbits is a sign of getting rid of worries and problems. What is the interpretation of a dream about a rabbit for a married woman? The dream of a married woman who has a large number of rabbits Evidence of achieving goals and desires. Seeing rabbits may indicate the beautiful appearance of pregnancy in the near future and feeding the child in good health. Rabbits storming the house in a married woman’s dream is evidence of the problems and fears that this woman falls into. Dreaming of dark-colored rabbits is an indication of stress and sadness that will be In the dreamer. What is the interpretation of a dream about a rabbit for a pregnant woman? A rabbit in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of easy childbirth and the safety of the fetus’s health. A dream about rabbits is evidence of good events that this woman will experience. Dark rabbits dream of the birth of a male. White rabbits are evidence of the birth of a female. Seeing a rabbit For a man in a dream: A rabbit in a man’s dream is evidence of the problems and troubles that this person suffers from. A black rabbit in a dream is considered evidence of unpleasant events that a man will go through in his next life. If a man sees that he is carrying a rabbit, this indicates the forbidden money that the fortuneteller obtains. Slaughtering a rabbit in a dream means that there is no good in it and may indicate death. What is the dream of a rabbit in a dream?

title: Interpretation of a dream about a yellow scorpion for single and married women and men

preview.html: If the man is single and has not been married before, this means that a lot of bad words have come out against his reputation at this time and he will be affected by them, and dreaming about someone indicates disagreements and problems, so stay with for more explanation through Al-Mowafir’s website. Interpretation of seeing a yellow scorpion in A dream for a single girl: If an unmarried girl dreams of seeing a yellow scorpion in her house and is afraid of it. This is a sign that there are major family differences in her life that she has not been able to get rid of. And seeing the dream of an unmarried girl in a dream is that she is looking at the yellow scorpion from afar. This is an indication that some Stressful things are coming in her life, and she will suffer for a long time from this event. The lonely dreaming girl looks at the yellow scorpion on her bed. It indicates that her fiancé betrayed her and she will be very upset. Likewise, the yellow scorpion seen in the dream by this lonely dreaming girl. Sign However, many bad words came out of her reputation and life during this period of time. See also: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a scorpion in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a yellow scorpion in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman dreams that she is looking at a yellow scorpion and its appearance is very ugly in the dream and she cannot continue looking. To him. It appears that some bad things happened in her life during this time. And the married woman who sees a yellow scorpion in a dream was very bad. It indicates that he will suffer at this time for a long time, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. And the married woman is a dreamer who in a dream is looking for a scorpion. Yellow to kill him, but she cannot find him. It indicates bad things in her life in which she lives, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing a married woman appears in a dream that she is looking at a yellow scorpion and it was beautiful in the dream for her. It indicates a treacherous person who will enter her life during this Time. Interpretation of seeing a yellow scorpion in a dream for a divorced woman. If a divorced woman sees a yellow scorpion near her in a dream and she is afraid. It indicates a big problem that she will face during this period and she will be very sad about this problem in her life. What if a divorced woman sees a yellow scorpion in her dream while she is inside her house. It appears. During this period, she will live in major disagreements with her family and those close to her. The divorced woman looks at the yellow scorpion while she is sitting near her ex-husband. This is an indication that she is thinking about returning to her ex-husband, but he is thinking about harming her in her life. Also, the divorced dreamer who succeeded in killing The yellow scorpion in a dream and he was very happy. It indicates that he will get rid of all the troubles and troubles that he is experiencing in this period, and God Almighty. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about a black scorpion for a married woman. This is an indication that there are problems that this dreamer will see in his life during this time. The dreamer who succeeds in killing the yellow scorpion in the dream indicates that he will

title: Interpretation of seeing someone wearing a gold chain in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a man wearing a gold chain in a dream via the website roy2a.comSeeing someone wearing a gold necklace for me in a dream means good news, success, success, pleasant surprises, the marriage of a girl to a rich young man, and the birth of a son to a pregnant woman. We will explain this in this article to men, young single men, married women and pregnant women, as well as divorced women and widows, by presenting the great imams’ interpretations of visions and dreams in ancient and modern times, so follow that. Us on the Ruya website. What is the interpretation of seeing a dream of a man wearing a gold chain in a dream about Ibn Sirin? If one sees himself wearing a chain around his neck in a dream, it shows that you bear many burdens and responsibilities. Dreaming of buying a piece of gold states that the dreamer is in a leadership position. Vision Yourself wearing a silver chain in a dream indicates a high status and family stability. You can also read an explanation: Interpretation of seeing a gold earring in a dream. What is the interpretation of a dream about a man wearing a gold chain in a dream about a single woman? If an unmarried girl sees herself in a dream wearing a gold chain, it indicates On success and progress in her life. Dreaming of wearing a silver chain in a dream for a single woman indicates that he has successfully passed the educational stages and distinguished himself or that he has reached a prominent position. What is the interpretation of a dream about a man wearing a gold chain in a dream about a married woman? If a married woman sees a gold chain in her dream This indicates prosperity and a safe and stable life. If a married woman sees that she is buying a gold chain, it is announced that he has given birth to good offspring. You can also read an explanation: Interpretation of seeing a cut gold chain in a dream. What is the interpretation of a dream of a man wearing a gold chain in a dream about a pregnant woman? If a pregnant woman dreams that she She wears a gold chain. If the chain is made of silver, it indicates the birth of a girl. If a pregnant woman sees someone giving her a metal chain, it indicates ease of childbirth, happiness with the baby, and abundance of goodness and livelihood, and a copper or iron chain is not good. What is the interpretation of a dream about a man wearing a chain? Gold in a dream about a divorced woman? Seeing gold chains in a dream for a divorced woman indicates happy news and occasions. If a divorced woman sees in a dream someone giving her a gold chain, it shows success in her career and again in her marriage, and if she sees her ex-husband wearing a chain on her, then she may This indicates that she will return to her ex-husband. You can also read an explanation: Interpretation of seeing gold in a dream. What is the interpretation of a divorced woman’s dream of a gold chain? Seeing a gold chain for a divorced woman in a dream announces once again her marriage to a rich and well-mannered man. If he sees in the dream that he is wearing a gold chain, it shows that she It occupies an important leadership position. What is the interpretation of a dream about a gold chain with God written on it? Seeing in a dream a gold chain with God’s name written on it indicates freedom from worries and problems and achieving what the dreamer wants. Seeing a sick person wearing a gold chain indicates recovery from the disease. Seeing a gold chain in a dream indicates To success in your professional and emotional life. You can also read an explanation: I dreamed of seeing gold, so what does it mean?

title: Interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing the deceased relieved in a dream via roy2a.com, seeing the deceased relieved in a dream, this indicates the fulfillment of desires and overcoming difficult stages. Feces on the hand or body indicate forbidden money, and cleaning the feces indicates overcoming difficulties and adversity. Imams such as Imam Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and other translators in the modern era, so follow us on the Roya website. What is the interpretation of Imam Ibn Sirin comforting the dead in a dream? Seeing the dead person in a dream comforting him indicates his need for charity and supplication for his lack of worship and good deeds before his death Seeing a dead person urinating in a dream indicates that the dreamer is going through a trial or many sins and lack of repentance. Seeing defecation or urinating in the house in a dream indicates problems and troubles on the dreamer’s path. Seeing a dead person defecating in the bathroom in a dream means that the dreamer will get money. See also: Interpretation of seeing dead people offering candy in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream for a single woman? Seeing a deceased father or mother defecating in a dream for an unmarried woman means that she has heard good news and will achieve what she desires in her life. Narrating the cleaning of feces in a dream for a girl indicates that she has overcome difficult stages, the end of worry, and recovery from illness. It also indicates that her marriage is approaching. See also: Interpretation Seeing dead people offering banknotes or coins in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a dead person relieving himself in a dream for a married woman? Narrating the excrement of a dead person in the house in a dream for a married woman indicates problems and many marital and family disputes. A dream about cleaning a dead person’s excrement in a dream for a married woman indicates... The death of worry, anxiety, and finding solutions to problems. If a married woman sees feces on her hands in a dream, this indicates forbidden money. See also: Interpretation of a dream about the dead giving bread to the living. What is the interpretation of seeing a dead person comforting himself in a dream for a pregnant woman? Seeing the dead resting in a woman’s dream Pregnant means that childbirth will be easy and that the stage of pregnancy and childbirth will pass safely. If a pregnant woman sees that her father is dead urinating, this indicates ease of childbirth and childbirth. What is the interpretation of seeing a dead person resting in a dream for a divorced woman? Seeing a divorced woman with a dead relative appearing in a dream indicates On the death of her worries and sorrows and the passage of difficult stages. Seeing a divorced woman cleaning excrement in a dream means satisfying desires and obtaining a sum of money, and it also indicates the collapse of problems and troubles. See also: Interpretation of seeing a dead person upset in a dream. What is the interpretation of a dream about cleaning the excrement of dead people in a dream? The dream of cleaning the excrement of a dead person indicates the forgiveness of the dead person for what he did before his death according to the dreamer. The dream of cleaning the excrement from the bathroom indicates getting rid of worries and sorrows. The dream of cleaning the excrement of a dead relative in a dream indicates reconciliation, rejecting disagreement, and getting rid of problems. See also: Interpretation of seeing a dead person asking about Someone in a dream: What is the interpretation of a dream about a dead person urinating and defecating? Seeing a deceased person urinating and defecating and feeling constipated in a dream means that the deceased needs alms, as
